程序包 com.sismics.docs.rest.resource

类 UserResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sismics.docs.rest.resource.BaseResource
      • com.sismics.docs.rest.resource.UserResource
  • @Path("/user")
public class UserResource
extends BaseResource
    User REST resources.
    作者:
    jtremeaux

      This resource is used to authenticate the user and create a user session.

      Create a key to reset a password and send it by email.

      Reset the user's password.

      Creates a new user.

      Returns all active sessions.

    • 方法详细资料

      • register

        @PUT
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response register​(@FormParam("username")
                                          String username,
                                          @FormParam("password")
                                          String password,
                                          @FormParam("email")
                                          String email,
                                          @FormParam("storage_quota")
                                          String storageQuotaStr)
        Creates a new user.
        参数:
        username - User's username
        password - Password
        email - E-Mail
        返回:
        Response

      • update

        @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response update​(@FormParam("password")
                                        String password,
                                        @FormParam("email")
                                        String email)
        Updates the current user informations.
        参数:
        password - Password
        email - E-Mail
        返回:
        Response

      • update

        @POST
@Path("{username: [a-zA-Z0-9_@\\.]+}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response update​(@PathParam("username")
                                        String username,
                                        @FormParam("password")
                                        String password,
                                        @FormParam("email")
                                        String email,
                                        @FormParam("storage_quota")
                                        String storageQuotaStr,
                                        @FormParam("disabled")
                                        Boolean disabled)
        Updates a user informations.
        参数:
        username - Username
        password - Password
        email - E-Mail
        返回:
        Response

      • checkUsername

        @GET
@Path("check_username")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response checkUsername​(@QueryParam("username")
                                               String username)
        Checks if a username is available. Search only on active accounts.
        参数:
        username - Username to check
        返回:
        Response

      • login

        @POST
@Path("login")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response login​(@FormParam("username")
                                       String username,
                                       @FormParam("password")
                                       String password,
                                       @FormParam("code")
                                       String validationCodeStr,
                                       @FormParam("remember")
                                       boolean longLasted)
        This resource is used to authenticate the user and create a user session. The "session" is only used to identify the user, no other data is stored in the session.
        参数:
        username - Username
        password - Password
        longLasted - Remember the user next time, create a long lasted session.
        返回:
        Response

      • logout

        @POST
@Path("logout")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response logout()
        Logs out the user and deletes the active session.
        返回:
        Response

      • delete

        @DELETE
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response delete()
        Deletes the current user.
        返回:
        Response

        @DELETE
@Path("{username: [a-zA-Z0-9_@\\.]+}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response delete​(@PathParam("username")
                                        String username)
        Deletes a user.
        参数:
        username - Username
        返回:
        Response

      • list

        @GET
@Path("list")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response list​(@QueryParam("sort_column")
                                      Integer sortColumn,
                                      @QueryParam("asc")
                                      Boolean asc,
                                      @QueryParam("group")
                                      String groupName)
        Returns all active users.
        参数:
        sortColumn - Sort index
        asc - If true, ascending sorting, else descending
        groupName - Only return users from this group
        返回:
        Response

        @GET
@Path("session")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response session()
        Returns all active sessions.
        返回:
        Response

@Path("password_lost")

      • passwordReset

        @POST
@Path("password_reset")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response passwordReset​(@FormParam("key")
                                               String passwordResetKey,
                                               @FormParam("password")
                                               String password)
        Reset the user's password.
        参数:
        passwordResetKey - Password reset key
        password - New password
        返回:
        Response
